name: Unrailed! clone
description:
Click here to play in fullscreen : https://unrailed.julienkermarec.com/

You must bring the train to the next station. 

 Add rails by collecting wood and stone throughout the course. 

 Do not forget to put water back on the train to avoid overheating. 

 Controls: ↟↞↡↠to move 

Spacebar to pick / drop
